description.value:
Requirements You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} from or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected]{Undetected} by all
of your opponents, and you aren't within 10 feet of any
enemy.

You leap from the shadows to strike your foes. @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Stride]{Stride} up to your Speed, then @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strike} twice. If you were hidden or unnoticed by the target of these Strikes, your foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} against both attacks.

Your multiple attack penalty applies normally for both attacks.
